page.title: 15LARKHALL RECREATION
page.content: MOST PEOPLE PREFER INDOOR ACTIVITES e.g COOKING WICH IS UNDERSTANDABLE CONSIDERING THE WEATHER INN THE WEST OF SCOTLAND.MALES ARE MORE ACTIVE IN TERMS OF RECREATIONTHEN FEMALES PARTICULARLY IN 4 ACTIVITES ON AVERAGE AS AGAINST FOR THE LATTER.MALES LIKE WALKING AND READING THE MOST. THE MOST POPULAR FACILITY IN LARKHALL FOR ALL AGE GROUPS IS THE SWIMMING POOL.THE MAIN REASION FOR TAKING UP AN ACTIVITY IS UNEMPLOYMENT AND FOR KEEPING FIT.UNEMPLOMENT THE WORST PRESSING PROBLEM OF TODAY REDUCES PEOPLES PARTICIPATION IN THEIR ACTIVITIES.EVEN THOUGH THEY HAVE MORE TIME MOST ACTIVITES COST MONEY WHICH THE UNEMPLOYED CAN NO LONGER SPARE.AS EXPECTED WE FOUND THAT INCREASING AGE ALSO REDUCES PEOPLES PARTICIPATION IN ACTIVITES.
